#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <time.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char c[100002];
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",&c);
        int length = strlen(c);
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int maximum=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(c[i]=='A')
                maximum++;
        }
        int temp = maximum;
        for(int j=n;j<length;j++)
        {
            if(c[j]=='A')
                temp++;
            if(c[j-n]=='A')
                temp--;
            maximum = max(maximum,temp);
        }
        printf("%d\n",(n-maximum));
    }
    return 0;
}
